metadata.title: CVE-2017-15573 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3, XSS exists because markupis mishandled in wiki content.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15573` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

redmine - 3.4.2-1
redmine-mysql - 3.4.2-1
redmine-pgsql - 3.4.2-1
redmine-sqlite - 3.4.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: redmine package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.4.2-1').
